title: Student Worker IV
duties_responsibilities: Craft compelling and tailored resumes and cover letters for students seeking on-campus jobs
Align resumes with specific job descriptions and highlight relevant skills, experiences, and achievements
Stay updated on prevailing hiring trends and Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)
Identify precise keywords, responsibilities, and requirements from job descriptions
required_qualifications: 15 years of experience in crafting on-campus job resumes and cover letters
Expertise in creating compelling and tailored CVs
Deep understanding of prevailing hiring trends and Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)
Ability to identify precise keywords, responsibilities, and requirements from job descriptions
preferred_qualifications: Experience in various positions and roles
Familiarity with different job markets and industries
